SELECT v.video_id, v.user_id, v.title, v.video_url, v.miusic_url, v.duration, v.topic, v.buddy, v.star_num, v.comment_num, v.view_num, v.share_num, v.create_time, u.uuid, u.nick_name, u.openid, u.phone, (select IF(count(1) > 0,1,0) from huomai_user_follow where user_id = #{bo.curUserId}) as attend_flag, (select IF(count(1) > 0,1,0) from huomai_user_follow where follow_user_id = #{bo.curUserId}) as follow_flag, (select IF(count(1) > 0,1,0) from huomai_user_love where business_id = v.video_id and type = 1 and user_id = #{bo.curUserId}) as love_flag FROM huomai_video v INNER JOIN huomai_user u ON v.user_id = u.user_id
AND v.`status` = '1' AND v.visible = '1'
and v.video_id = #{bo.videoId}
order by v.create_time desc

SELECT v.video_id, v.user_id, v.title, v.video_url, v.miusic_url, v.duration, v.topic, v.buddy, v.star_num, v.comment_num, v.view_num, v.share_num, v.create_time, u.uuid, u.nick_name, u.openid, u.phone FROM huomai_video v INNER JOIN huomai_user u ON v.user_id = u.user_id
AND v.`status` = '1' AND v.visible = '1'
and v.user_id in (select follow_user_id from huomai_user_follow where user_id = #{bo.curUserId})
and (v.title like concat('%',#{bo.searchKey},'%') or v.topic like concat('%',#{bo.searchKey},'%') or v.buddy like concat('%',#{bo.searchKey},'%'))
order by v.create_time desc
